arguments.huntSearchQuery: @timestamp:{ {{vars.huntStartDateTime}} TO {{vars.huntEndDateTime}} } AND event_id:1 AND (event_data.CommandLine:"*misc\:\:addsid*" OR event_data.CommandLine:"*sid\:\:*")

params.query: event_type:sysmon AND event_id:"1" AND @timestamp:{ {{vars.huntStartDateTime}} TO {{vars.huntEndDateTime}} } AND image_path:*lsass.exe NOT image_path:C\:\\Windows\\System32\\lsass.exe NOT image_path:C\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\lsass.exe

steps.name: Query for DLL load from illegitimate LSASS

arguments.name: ElasticSearch

params.query: event_type:sysmon AND event_id:"7" AND @timestamp:{ {{vars.huntStartDateTime}} TO {{vars.huntEndDateTime}} } AND image_path.keyword:*lsass.exe NOT image_path.keyword:C\:\\Windows\\*ystem32\\* NOT image_path.keyword:C\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\* NOT event_data.ImageLoaded.keyword:C\:\\Windows\\*ystem32\\* NOT event_data.ImageLoaded:.keywordC\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\* NOT event_data.ImageLoaded.keyword:C\:\\Program\ Files\\* NOT event_data.ImageLoaded.keyword:C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\*

params.query: event_type:sysmon AND event_id:"7" AND @timestamp:{ {{vars.huntStartDateTime}} TO {{vars.huntEndDateTime}} } AND (image_path:"C:\\Windows\\System32\\lsass.exe" OR image_path:"C:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\lsass.exe") NOT event_data.ImageLoaded:C\:\\Windows\\System32\\*  NOT event_data.ImageLoaded:C\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\* NOT event_data.ImageLoaded:C\:\\Program\ Files\\* NOT event_data.ImageLoaded:C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\*

routes.name: Query for WinLogHelper DLL -> Query for Illegitimate LSASS
Query for DLL load from illegitimate LSASS -> Query for illegitimate DLL load
Query for illegitimate DLL load -> Step Output
Query for Illegitimate LSASS -> Query for DLL load from illegitimate LSASS
Build Hunt Query -> Run Elastic Query
